name: Echo (itch) (Amir Bayareh, MildredHam, Jesús Mastache Caballero, CarlosBarcena)
name_original: Echo (itch) (Amir Bayareh, MildredHam, Jesús Mastache Caballero, CarlosBarcena)
description:
2 bat friends work to escape from a thorn maze helping each other find the way with their echolocation.
Control both bats in 1 player mode or play with a friend in 2 players mode.

                                                                                                

Entry for the Global Game Jam 2021. #MadeWithUnity

Installation Instructions: 

Decompress the zip file, then open the folder according to your OS.

Finally, double click on the "EchoGGJ21.exe" executable

Connect a gamepad if you want to play the 2 players mode

Controls:

Keyboard

WASD for movement

ENTER to use echolocation

SPACE to change characters (1 player mode only)

Gamepad

DPad / Left Joy for movement

South button (A in Xbox) to use echolocation

East button (B in Xbox) to change characters (1 player mode only)

After using echolocation, you have to wait a 6 seconds cooldown, the bat shines when the power can be used again.
